pages.text: Marisa's Broom is a convenient flying device. After mounting the broom by right-clicking, you can control your motion in the same way as riding a horse. $(br2)Maids will auto mount onto brooms if they are close by. Maids on brooms will also tend to fly in the sky.
However, currently, players can only ride on broom in creative mode by default. You can change this behavior in config file.
